name: Just Dance 2019
description: Just Dance 2019 is a dance rhythm game developed by Ubisoft. It was unveiled on June 11, 2018, during its E3 press conference, and was released on October 23, 2018 on Nintendo Switch, Wii, Wii U, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Xbox 360 in North America. It was also released on October 26, 2018 in Europe and Australia. It is also the last Just Dance game to be released for the Wii U and Xbox 360.
